'Thank you for helping! I hope we do not lose too many crops....'

Frantic gardeners and farmers can be found throughout the eastern side of Edoras, where poorer townspeople rely upon their crops.\n\nYou should help the frantic gardeners and farmers tend their plots.
'Thank you for helping! I hope we do not lose too many crops....'

'How kind of you to help the farmers, [placeholder]! The people on this side of town are very worried about going hungry, for they worked hard to sow their crops this year. They haven't much money, you see....\n\n'I hope your efforts will give them some peace of mind when they leave their fields and garden behind.'
(Must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras)
Léodferth can be found near the east gate of Edoras.\n\nYou should speak with Léodferth.

Many farmers and gardeners are desperately tending their crops before they leave, hoping that they will have food upon their return to the Edoras.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Edoras quests must be completed before the Evacuation of Edoras takes place.</rgb>
Pull the last of the weeds ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'I'm very busy! What do you want?

'The weeds will take over while we are gone, and choke out my crops. We'll go hungry if we ever come back! And the land...it is so dry.'
